Package com.facetec.sdk

Class FaceTecResultScreenCustomization

java.lang.Object
com.facetec.sdk.FaceTecResultScreenCustomization
public final class FaceTecResultScreenCustomization extends Object
Customize the Result Screen. Shown for server-side work and response handling.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    int
    activityIndicatorColor
    Color of the activity indicator animation shown during server-side work.
    Default is custom color.
    float
    animationRelativeScale
    Control the size of the animation displayed while the camera is loading.
    This value represents the scaling factor that will be applied to the default animation bounds.
    This value has to be between 0.5 and 2.0.
    int
    backgroundColors
    Color of the Result Screen's background.
    This accepts a color or drawable resource id.
    Default is white.
    int
    customActivityIndicatorAnimation
    Configure an animated vector drawable to display on the Result Screen for the activity indicator animation during server-side work.
    Note: All resources required for the vector drawable animation needs to be included in your app's res directory before launching.
    Note: The activity indicator animation is displayed indefinitely during the server-side work, so the custom animation should be set to loop/repeat infinitely.
    int
    customActivityIndicatorImage
    Image displayed and rotated during server-side work.
    If image is configured, default activity indicator will be hidden.
    Default is set to 0 and will fallback to using the default activity indicator animation, which respects the color assigned to .activityIndicatorColor.
    int
    customActivityIndicatorRotationInterval
    Control the speed of the rotation for your custom activity indicator image.
    Only applicable when image is configured for .customActivityIndicatorImage.
    This value indicates the duration of each full rotation (in milliseconds).
    Default is 1000.
    int
    customResultAnimationIDScanSuccess
    Configure an animated vector drawable to display on the Result Screen for ID Scan success scenarios.
    Note: All resources required for the vector drawable animation needs to be included in your app's res directory before launching.
    Note: By default, the animation is displayed for 2 seconds, but can be configured within a range using the FaceTecResultScreenCustomization.resultAnimationDisplayTime API.
    int
    customResultAnimationNFCSuccess
    Configure an animated vector drawable to display on the Result Screen for NFC Scan success scenarios.
    Note: All resources required for the vector drawable animation needs to be included in your app's res directory before launching.
    Note: By default, the animation is displayed for 2 seconds, but can be configured within a range using the FaceTecResultScreenCustomization.resultAnimationDisplayTime API.
    int
    customResultAnimationSuccess
    Configure an animated vector drawable to display on the Result Screen for FaceScan success scenarios.
    Note: All resources required for the vector drawable animation needs to be included in your app's res directory before launching.
    Note: By default, the animation is displayed for 2 seconds, but can be configured within a range using the FaceTecResultScreenCustomization.resultAnimationDisplayTime API.
    int
    customResultAnimationUnsuccess
    Configure an animated vector drawable to display on the Result Screen for unsuccess scenarios.
    int
    customSessionAbortAnimation
    Configure an animated vector drawable to display on the Session Abort screen.
    Note: All resources required for the vector drawable animation needs to be included in your app's res directory before launching.
    If this is set to an animated vector drawable resource id, the drawable supplied will be used instead of the default animation or any image configured with FaceTecResultScreenCustomization.sessionAbortAnimationBackgroundImage.
    If this is 0, a default animation will be used.
    Default is 0.
    double
    faceScanStillUploadingMessageDelayTime
    Controls the length of time to wait while the FaceScan Session server request is pending before transitioning the Result Screen upload message to the "Still Uploading" localization.
    The applicable localizations include: "FaceTec_result_facescan_upload_message_still_uploading".
    Value is in seconds.
    int
    foregroundColor
    Color of the text displayed on the Result Screen.
    Default is custom color.
    double
    idScanStillUploadingMessageDelayTime
    Controls the length of time to wait while the ID Scan Session server request is pending before transitioning the Result Screen upload message to the "Still Uploading" localization.
    The applicable localizations include: "FaceTec_result_idscan_upload_message_front_side_still_uploading", "FaceTec_result_idscan_upload_message_back_side_still_uploading", "FaceTec_result_idscan_upload_message_nfc_still_uploading", "FaceTec_result_idscan_upload_message_skipped_nfc_still_uploading", "FaceTec_result_idscan_upload_message_user_confirmed_info_still_uploading".
    Value is in seconds.
    android.graphics.Typeface
    messageFont
    Font of the message text displayed on the Result Screen.
    If this value is null, FaceTec's default Typeface will be used.
    int
    resultAnimationBackgroundColor
    Color of the default result animation's background for success scenarios.
    Default is custom color.
    double
    resultAnimationDisplayTime
    Controls the length of time to display the Result Screen result animation after being transitioned in and before being transitioned out.
    Value is in seconds.
    int
    resultAnimationForegroundColor
    Color of the default result animation's accent color for success scenarios.
    Default is white.
    int
    resultAnimationIDScanSuccessForegroundColor
    Color of the default result animation's accent color for ID Scan success scenarios.
    Default is custom color.
    int
    resultAnimationNFCSuccessForegroundColor
    Color of the default result animation's accent color for NFC success scenarios.
    Default is custom color.
    int
    resultAnimationSuccessBackgroundImage
    Image displayed behind the default result foreground animation for success scenarios.
    If image is configured, default result background animation will be hidden.
    Default is set to 0 and will fallback to using the default result background animation, which respects the color assigned to .resultAnimationBackgroundColor.
    int
    resultAnimationUnsuccessBackgroundColor
    Color of the default result animation's background for unsuccess scenarios.
    Default is transparent.
    int
    resultAnimationUnsuccessBackgroundImage
    Image displayed behind the default result foreground animation for unsuccess scenarios.
    int
    resultAnimationUnsuccessForegroundColor
    Color of the default result animation's accent color for success scenarios.
    Default is custom color.
    int
    sessionAbortAnimationBackgroundColor
    Color of the default Session Abort animation's background.
    Default is custom color.
    int
    sessionAbortAnimationBackgroundImage
    Image displayed behind the foreground animation for the Session Abort screen.
    If the image is configured, the default background animation will be hidden.
    Default is set to 0 and will fallback to using the default background animation, which respects the color assigned to FaceTecResultScreenCustomization.sessionAbortAnimationBackgroundColor.
    int
    sessionAbortAnimationForegroundColor
    Color of the default Session Abort screen animation's accent color.
    Default is white.
    boolean
    showUploadProgressBar
    Control whether to show or hide the upload progress bar during server-side work.
    Default is true (shown).
    int
    uploadProgressFillColor
    Color of the upload progress bar's fill.
    Default is custom color.
    int
    uploadProgressTrackColor
    Color of upload progress bar's track.
    Default is a semi-opaque shade of black.

  • Method Summary

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • animationRelativeScale

      public float animationRelativeScale
      Control the size of the animation displayed while the camera is loading.
      This value represents the scaling factor that will be applied to the default animation bounds.
      This value has to be between 0.5 and 2.0. If it’s lower than 0.5 or higher than 2.0, it will be defaulted to 0.5 or 2.0 respectively.
      Default value is 1.

    • foregroundColor

      public int foregroundColor
      Color of the text displayed on the Result Screen.
      Default is custom color.

    • backgroundColors

      public int backgroundColors
      Color of the Result Screen's background.
      This accepts a color or drawable resource id.
      Default is white.

    • activityIndicatorColor

      public int activityIndicatorColor
      Color of the activity indicator animation shown during server-side work.
      Default is custom color.

    • customActivityIndicatorImage

      @DrawableRes public int customActivityIndicatorImage
      Image displayed and rotated during server-side work.
      If image is configured, default activity indicator will be hidden.
      Default is set to 0 and will fallback to using the default activity indicator animation, which respects the color assigned to .activityIndicatorColor.

    • customActivityIndicatorRotationInterval

      public int customActivityIndicatorRotationInterval
      Control the speed of the rotation for your custom activity indicator image.
      Only applicable when image is configured for .customActivityIndicatorImage.
      This value indicates the duration of each full rotation (in milliseconds).
      Default is 1000.

    • customActivityIndicatorAnimation

      @DrawableRes public int customActivityIndicatorAnimation
      Configure an animated vector drawable to display on the Result Screen for the activity indicator animation during server-side work.
      Note: All resources required for the vector drawable animation needs to be included in your app's res directory before launching.
      Note: The activity indicator animation is displayed indefinitely during the server-side work, so the custom animation should be set to loop/repeat infinitely. If the animation ends before the activity indicator is dismissed, the animation will be restarted.
      If this is set to an animated vector drawable, the drawable supplied will be used instead of the default activity indicator animation or any rotating-image animation configured with FaceTecResultScreenCustomization.customActivityIndicatorImage.
      If this is 0, FaceTecResultScreenCustomization.customActivityIndicatorImage will be used. If FaceTecResultScreenCustomization.customActivityIndicatorImage is 0, the default activity indicator animation will be used.
      Default is 0.

    • showUploadProgressBar

      public boolean showUploadProgressBar
      Control whether to show or hide the upload progress bar during server-side work.
      Default is true (shown).

    • uploadProgressFillColor

      public int uploadProgressFillColor
      Color of the upload progress bar's fill.
      Default is custom color.

    • uploadProgressTrackColor

      public int uploadProgressTrackColor
      Color of upload progress bar's track.
      Default is a semi-opaque shade of black.

    • resultAnimationBackgroundColor

      public int resultAnimationBackgroundColor
      Color of the default result animation's background for success scenarios.
      Default is custom color.

    • resultAnimationUnsuccessBackgroundColor

      public int resultAnimationUnsuccessBackgroundColor
      Color of the default result animation's background for unsuccess scenarios.
      Default is transparent.

    • resultAnimationForegroundColor

      public int resultAnimationForegroundColor
      Color of the default result animation's accent color for success scenarios.
      Default is white.

    • resultAnimationIDScanSuccessForegroundColor

      public int resultAnimationIDScanSuccessForegroundColor
      Color of the default result animation's accent color for ID Scan success scenarios.
      Default is custom color.

    • resultAnimationNFCSuccessForegroundColor

      public int resultAnimationNFCSuccessForegroundColor
      Color of the default result animation's accent color for NFC success scenarios.
      Default is custom color.

    • resultAnimationUnsuccessForegroundColor

      public int resultAnimationUnsuccessForegroundColor
      Color of the default result animation's accent color for success scenarios.
      Default is custom color.

    • resultAnimationSuccessBackgroundImage

      @DrawableRes public int resultAnimationSuccessBackgroundImage
      Image displayed behind the default result foreground animation for success scenarios.
      If image is configured, default result background animation will be hidden.
      Default is set to 0 and will fallback to using the default result background animation, which respects the color assigned to .resultAnimationBackgroundColor.

    • sessionAbortAnimationBackgroundColor

      public int sessionAbortAnimationBackgroundColor
      Color of the default Session Abort animation's background.
      Default is custom color.

    • sessionAbortAnimationForegroundColor

      public int sessionAbortAnimationForegroundColor
      Color of the default Session Abort screen animation's accent color.
      Default is white.

    • resultAnimationUnsuccessBackgroundImage

      @DrawableRes public int resultAnimationUnsuccessBackgroundImage
      Image displayed behind the default result foreground animation for unsuccess scenarios. Unsuccess result animations are only shown for unsuccessful Photo ID Match attempts.
      If image is configured, default result background animation will be hidden.
      Default is set to 0 and will fallback to using the default result background animation, which respects the color assigned to .resultAnimationUnsuccessBackgroundColor.

    • customResultAnimationSuccess

      @DrawableRes public int customResultAnimationSuccess
      Configure an animated vector drawable to display on the Result Screen for FaceScan success scenarios.
      Note: All resources required for the vector drawable animation needs to be included in your app's res directory before launching.
      Note: By default, the animation is displayed for 2 seconds, but can be configured within a range using the FaceTecResultScreenCustomization.resultAnimationDisplayTime API. Custom animation timing should be configured accordingly.
      If this is set to an animated vector drawable resource id, the drawable supplied will be used instead of the default success animation or any success image configured with FaceTecResultScreenCustomization.resultAnimationSuccessBackgroundImage.
      If this is 0, the default success animation will be used.
      Default is 0.

    • customResultAnimationIDScanSuccess

      @DrawableRes public int customResultAnimationIDScanSuccess
      Configure an animated vector drawable to display on the Result Screen for ID Scan success scenarios.
      Note: All resources required for the vector drawable animation needs to be included in your app's res directory before launching.
      Note: By default, the animation is displayed for 2 seconds, but can be configured within a range using the FaceTecResultScreenCustomization.resultAnimationDisplayTime API. Custom animation timing should be configured accordingly.
      If this is set to an animated vector drawable resource id, the drawable supplied will be used instead of the default success animation or any success image configured with FaceTecResultScreenCustomization.resultAnimationSuccessBackgroundImage.
      If this is 0, the default success animation will be used.
      Default is 0.

    • customResultAnimationNFCSuccess

      @DrawableRes public int customResultAnimationNFCSuccess
      Configure an animated vector drawable to display on the Result Screen for NFC Scan success scenarios.
      Note: All resources required for the vector drawable animation needs to be included in your app's res directory before launching.
      Note: By default, the animation is displayed for 2 seconds, but can be configured within a range using the FaceTecResultScreenCustomization.resultAnimationDisplayTime API. Custom animation timing should be configured accordingly.
      If this is set to an animated vector drawable resource id, the drawable supplied will be used instead of the default success animation or any success image configured with FaceTecResultScreenCustomization.resultAnimationSuccessBackgroundImage.
      If this is 0, the default success animation will be used.
      Default is 0.

    • customResultAnimationUnsuccess

      @DrawableRes public int customResultAnimationUnsuccess
      Configure an animated vector drawable to display on the Result Screen for unsuccess scenarios. Unsuccess result animations are only shown for unsuccessful Photo ID Match attempts.
      Note: All resources required for the vector drawable animation needs to be included in your app's res directory before launching.
      Note: By default, the animation is displayed for 2 seconds, but can be configured within a range using the FaceTecResultScreenCustomization.resultAnimationDisplayTime API. Custom animation timing should be configured accordingly.
      If this is set to an animated vector drawable resource id, the drawable supplied will be used instead of the default unsuccess animation or any unsuccess image configured with FaceTecResultScreenCustomization.resultAnimationUnsuccessBackgroundImage.
      If this is 0, the default unsuccess animation will be used.
      Default is 0.

    • sessionAbortAnimationBackgroundImage

      @DrawableRes public int sessionAbortAnimationBackgroundImage
      Image displayed behind the foreground animation for the Session Abort screen.
      If the image is configured, the default background animation will be hidden.
      Default is set to 0 and will fallback to using the default background animation, which respects the color assigned to FaceTecResultScreenCustomization.sessionAbortAnimationBackgroundColor.

    • customSessionAbortAnimation

      @DrawableRes public int customSessionAbortAnimation
      Configure an animated vector drawable to display on the Session Abort screen.
      Note: All resources required for the vector drawable animation needs to be included in your app's res directory before launching.
      If this is set to an animated vector drawable resource id, the drawable supplied will be used instead of the default animation or any image configured with FaceTecResultScreenCustomization.sessionAbortAnimationBackgroundImage.
      If this is 0, a default animation will be used.
      Default is 0.

    • messageFont

      public android.graphics.Typeface messageFont
      Font of the message text displayed on the Result Screen.
      If this value is null, FaceTec's default Typeface will be used. Default is null.

    • faceScanStillUploadingMessageDelayTime

      public double faceScanStillUploadingMessageDelayTime
      Controls the length of time to wait while the FaceScan Session server request is pending before transitioning the Result Screen upload message to the "Still Uploading" localization.
      The applicable localizations include: "FaceTec_result_facescan_upload_message_still_uploading".
      Value is in seconds. This value must be set to a value between 5.0 and 10.0. If it's lower than 5.0 or higher than 10.0, it will be defaulted to 5.0 or 10.0 respectively.
      Default is 6.0.

    • idScanStillUploadingMessageDelayTime

      public double idScanStillUploadingMessageDelayTime
      Controls the length of time to wait while the ID Scan Session server request is pending before transitioning the Result Screen upload message to the "Still Uploading" localization.
      The applicable localizations include: "FaceTec_result_idscan_upload_message_front_side_still_uploading", "FaceTec_result_idscan_upload_message_back_side_still_uploading", "FaceTec_result_idscan_upload_message_nfc_still_uploading", "FaceTec_result_idscan_upload_message_skipped_nfc_still_uploading", "FaceTec_result_idscan_upload_message_user_confirmed_info_still_uploading".
      Value is in seconds. This value must be set to a value between 5.0 and 10.0. If it's lower than 5.0 or higher than 10.0, it will be defaulted to 5.0 or 10.0 respectively.
      Default is 8.0.

    • resultAnimationDisplayTime

      public double resultAnimationDisplayTime
      Controls the length of time to display the Result Screen result animation after being transitioned in and before being transitioned out.
      Value is in seconds. This value has to be between 1.5 and 3.0. If it’s lower than 1.5 or higher than 3.0, it will be defaulted to 1.5 or 3.0 respectively.
      Default is 2 (seconds).

  • Constructor Details

    • FaceTecResultScreenCustomization

      public FaceTecResultScreenCustomization()
      Constructor for FaceTecResultScreenCustomization object.
